text:
2/21/2017 9:54 AM ET | Filed under: Baby Blabber ‚Ä¢ Twitter ‚Ä¢ Carson Daly ‚Ä¢ Celeb Kidz ‚Ä¢ Matt Lauer 
CONGRATULATIONS! 
On Tuesday, Hoda Kotb revealed she's now the proud momma of a baby girl, named Haley Joy Kotb . Thankfully, the TODAY show personality called into her morning program to drop all kinds of deets about her adopted little one. 
Miz Kotb revealed: 
"She's a Valentine's baby‚Ä¶ She is the love of my life." 
A ! And her peers, specifically Carson Daly and Al Roker , seemed pretty shocked by the baby news as they couldn't pick their jaws up off of the floor (below). 
WATCH: "You were made to be a mom." @kathielgifford told @hodakotb https://t.co/UJom0hKR2O pic.twitter.com/oKKyovqFNL ‚Äî TODAY (@TODAYshow) February 21, 2017 
Obviously, Hoda's coworkers sent her only love following the big announcement as Matt Lauer noted: 
"This little girl Haley is the luckiest girl. You're going to be one of the most fantastic moms I can ever imagine. " 
Not to mention, the 52-year-old's TV bestie Kathie Lee Gifford added: 
"We are thrilled for you. You were made to be a mom." 
Hear! Hear! After getting over his shock, Daly joked: 
"You're going to be an incredible mother. You thought you drank a lot of wine before? Just wait." 
NBC meteorologist Dylan Dreyer also congratulated the new mom as she wrote on Twitter : 
There is no joy like being a mother! @hodakotb I'm so beyond happy for you!!! Welcome aboard the baby train! üíùüíùüçºüçºüçºShe's precious! ‚Äî Dylan Dreyer (@DylanDreyerNBC) February 21, 2017 
And it seems the industry vet's friends aren't the only ones happy for her, as Kotb's own mother quipped to her baby girl: 
"We've been waiting a long time for you." 
Too cute! In case you forgot, Hoda moved in with her boyfriend, named Joel Schiffman , just last year. She was previously married Burzis Kanga . But, sadly, in 2007 the journalist and the former University of New Orleans tennis coach divorced. They had no children together.
